name: Ext_R4B_Procedure_reasonCode
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.Procedure.reasonCode for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents Procedure.reasonCode from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Procedure|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: The coded reason why the procedure was performed. This may be a coded entity of some type, or may simply be present as text.
element.comment: `Procedure.reasonCode` maps to R5 `Procedure.reason`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `Procedure.reasonCode` maps to R5 `Procedure.reason`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: The coded reason why the procedure was performed. This may be a coded entity of some type, or may simply be present as text.
element.comment: `Procedure.reasonCode` maps to R5 `Procedure.reason`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `Procedure.reasonCode` maps to R5 `Procedure.reason`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: A code that identifies the reason a procedure is  required.
